changeSet.sql:
UPDATE SCORING_MODEL_VERSION SET ALLOCATION_PCT = 100
UPDATE SMV SET SMV.ALLOCATION_PCT = 5 FROM SCORING_MODEL_VERSION SMV INNER JOIN SCORING_MODEL SM ON (SM.SCORING_MODEL_ID = SMV.SCORING_MODEL_ID) WHERE SM.CODE IN ('RANDOM')
UPDATE SMV SET SMV.DEFAULT_REVIEW_TYPE_ID = (SELECT REVIEW_TYPE_ID FROM REVIEW_TYPE_REF WHERE REVIEW_TYPE_CD = 'U'), SMV.REVIEW_SCOPE_ID = (SELECT REVIEW_SCOPE_ID FROM REVIEW_SCOPE_REF WHERE CODE = 'F') FROM SCORING_MODEL_VERSION SMV INNER JOIN SCORING_MODEL SM ON (SM.SCORING_MODEL_ID = SMV.SCORING_MODEL_ID) WHERE SM.CODE NOT IN ('ASSIGNMENT', 'DISTRIBUTION')
UPDATE SMV SET SMV.MODEL_NAME = SM.DESCRIPTION, SMV.DESCRIPTION = 'Default ' + SM.DESCRIPTION + ' Scoring Model' FROM SCORING_MODEL_VERSION SMV INNER JOIN SCORING_MODEL SM ON (SM.SCORING_MODEL_ID = SMV.SCORING_MODEL_ID) GO ALTER TABLE LOAN_SELECTION_PENDING ALTER COLUMN REVIEW_TYPE_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL ALTER TABLE SCORING_MODEL_VERSION ALTER COLUMN ALLOCATION_PCT INT NOT NULL ALTER TABLE SCORING_MODEL_VERSION ALTER COLUMN MODEL_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL ALTER TABLE SCORING_MODEL_VERSION ALTER COLUMN DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL ALTER TABLE SCORING_MODEL_VERSION ALTER COLUMN MODEL_SCORE_THRESHOLD INT NOT NULL
